alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 3:19PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Sierra and northwestern Dona Ana Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 318 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Salem, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Upham and Salem. This includes Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 45 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes
